name: Malak Grami
title: Software Engineer
subtitle: Your Go To.
description: Motivated fresh Software Engineering graduate with 17 months of internship experience across diverse tech environments. Passionate about building innovative solutions and continuously learning new technologies.

features.title: Backend Development
features.description: I build robust backend systems using NestJS, Django Rest Framework, Laravel, and FastAPI. I develop RESTful APIs, implement JWT authentication, integrate machine learning models, and create microservices architecture with Redis for scalable applications.

features.title: Full Stack Development
features.description: I create complete web applications using React + NestJS, Laravel + MySQL, and MERN stack. I handle everything from database design to user interface, implementing role-based access control and subscription management systems.

features.title: Mobile Development
features.description: I develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Firebase. I build apps with real-time chat, image sharing, social media functionality, and parent-child monitoring systems with seamless mobile-web integration.

features.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics
features.description: I create comprehensive Power BI dashboards and data visualization solutions. I develop analytics systems for business intelligence, sales tracking, and performance monitoring, leveraging my background in business intelligence.

features.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
features.description: I implement comprehensive testing strategies using Jest for unit testing, ensure code reliability and optimize performance. I integrate testing into development workflows to maintain high-quality, robust applications.

features.title: API Integration & ML
features.description: I specialize in integrating machine learning models into web applications using NLP and Hugging Face Transformers. I create intelligent systems like CV-job matching and develop seamless third-party API integrations.
